src:
Prokletstvo Budućnosti u završnicama, Dion Tompson vrhovima prstiju utišao Podgoricu
Unikaha slavila na gostovanju u Morači

06 Nov 2019


Svašta je Budućnost preživela u ovih mesec i po dana nove sezone, od toga da ostanu bez trenera, do toga da im se evropske ambicije uruše kao kula od karata posle najava da će klub napasti trofej u Evrokupu. Ali, ono što je dosad nesumnjivo obeležilo sezonu Budućnosti jesu porazi u neizvesnim završnicama! Jednostavno, neko prokletstvo se uvuklo u redove crnogorskog šampiona i još ne mogu da ga se otresu... Posle tesnih poraza od Gdinje, Galatasaraja i Oldenburga u Evrokupu, odnosno Primorske u ABA ligi, izabranici Petra Mijovića pretrpeli su sličan neuspeh i protiv Unikahe u Podgorici – 81:82.

Poraz kao takav nije iznenađenje, pošto je Unikaha opet jedan od favorita za trofej, ali način na koji se to desilo definitivno će naterati mnoge u timu da se zapitaju šta se to dešava u poslednjim trenucima... Haime Fernandez je na dve sekunde pre isteka vremena pokušao da reši situaciju i nije uspeo, ali se na pravom mestu našao bivši centar Crvene zvezde Dion Tompson koji je loptu vrhovima prstiju “ošamario“ i vratio je u koš... Morača je zanemela.
A, imala je Budućnost lidera svoje grupe na tacni. Džastin Kobs je ponovo namučio goste iz Andaluzije i meč završio s 26 poena, ali je na kraju ostao vlažnog baruta i napravio kobnu grešku iz koje je napravio faul u napadu nad Fernandezom.
Poslednje poene Budućnost je ubacila na 32 sekunde pre kraja kada je Skot Bamfort postigao trojku za 81:77 i tako anulirao poene Diona Tompsona! Ali, tada je sve stalo... Ubrzo je Hasan Martin faulirao Aksela Tupana na šutu za tri poena, francuski internacionalac je bio siguran u sva tri pokušaja sa crte i tako maksimalno istopio prednost Budućnosti. I onda se dogodio hladan tuš zbog kojeg je Budućnost ostala bez pobede u Evrokupu ove sezone...
Bamfort je ispratio Kobsa s 18 poena, Martin je imao 12 poena i sedam uhvaćenih lopti, dok su ostali bili jednocifreni. Unikahu je predvodio Tupan s 17 poena, Volodimir Gerun je dopisao 13, a Tompson 10 poena, uz četiri skoka.

EVROKUP - 6. kolo




GRUPA A



UtorakAndora - Monako 95:68/Hana 16 - Bakner 16/

text:
Curse of the Future in the finals, Dion Thompson silenced Podgorica with his fingertips
Unikaha celebrated on a guest appearance in Moraca

06 Nov 2019


The future has survived all these months and a half of the new season, from losing their coaches to crashing their European ambitions like a ticket tower after announcing that the club will attack the Euro Cup trophy. But what has undoubtedly marked the season of the Future so far are defeats in the uncertain finals! Simply, some curse has crept into the ranks of the Montenegrin champion and they cannot yet shake it off ... After close defeats to Gdynia, Galatasaray and Oldenburg in Eurocup, or Primorska in the ABA league, Petar Mijovic's favorites suffered a similar failure against Uniqa in Podgorica - 81:82.

Defeat as such is no surprise, as Unicaja is once again one of the favorites for the trophy, but the way it happened will definitely make many on the team wonder what is happening in the final moments ... Haime Fernandez is two seconds ahead of expiration He tried to solve the situation and failed, but former Red Star center Dion Thompson found himself in the right place, slapping the ball with his fingertips and returning it to the basket.
And, she had the Future Leader of her group on the tray. Justin Kobs re-tortured the Andalusian away team and finished the match with 26 points, but in the end left a damp gunpowder and made a fatal mistake from which he made a foul in an attack on Fernandez.
Last points The future scored 32 seconds before the end when Scott Bamfort scored three for 81-77, canceling Dion Thompson's points! But then everything stopped ... Shortly after, Hasan Martin fouled Axel Tupano on a three-point shot, the French international was sure of all three attempts from the line, thus maximizing the advantage of Future. And then there was a cold shower that left the future without a win at EuroCup this season ...
Bamfort accompanied Kobs with 18 points, Martin had 12 points and seven balls, while the others were single digits. Unikahu was led by Tupan with 17 points, Volodimir Gerun posted 13 and Thompson 10 points, with four rebounds.
